abstract: Richard Sandomir TV Sports column observes that network production crews have friendly impression of New England Patriots coach Bill Belichick, in contrast to his notoriously gloomy public image; notes that Belichick has been convivial and illuminating during closed-door meetings in which producers and directors are allowed to ask coaches private questions about direction of their teams.
lead_paragraph: Bill Belichick’s funereal demeanor is rooted in the public imagination, but as one N.F.L. network analyst said, meetings with him can be illuminating, even fun.
snippet: Bill Belichick’s funereal demeanor is rooted in the public imagination, but as one N.F.L. network analyst said, meetings with him can be illuminating, even fun.

headline.main: Behind the Scenes, Network Production Crews Find a Friendlier Belichick
headline.print_headline: Behind the Scenes, Network Production Crews Find a Friendlier Belichick
